```
$ curl -c cookie http://localhost:3000
vagrant@helix ~/myworkspace/raymond (HCE-35) $ cat cookie
# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# http://curl.haxx.se/docs/http-cookies.html
# This file was generated by libcurl! Edit at your own risk.

localhost   FALSE   /   FALSE   0   XSRF-TOKEN  ok2ttOdoVqDhoxKNHjhzFj6maV6ty25nnuOGj4%2Bo7SpayOpWgyZ3FMZmcNEMPpOzWekXtznGWTuPLa5ydLEpHQ%3D%3D
#HttpOnly_localhost FALSE   /   FALSE   0   _raymond_session    SnU1SzZKVDVQZURSdU5rbVpQZGJmN2dEZzMzUVZRZW1WNEM5MnJBZU1kQXpaektRTmVzOGNGM0JEQVlvSmt4QWRRalBuV2hTZHRnR2pkdWs5ZGlOSmZlWWVsakNnYnUxaE9zeTViUkNZdmZVd1BZSGNneHhoSFJTbFlESXd0MDlVME0zcmRTV3c3M2o5NHcwVGN5TmdBPT0tLVdJek1Gc1FmNU0xU3JSY1h2NU9TVWc9PQ%3D%3D--45856b4a75e625f1c8203af3c91016cecf2d6a5f
localhost   FALSE   /   FALSE   0   __profilin  p%3Dt

# decode XSRF-TOKEN, i.e., change %3D to =, %2B to + and set as the value of authenticity_token

$ curl -X POST -c dookie -b cookie -F "user[email]=ali@perforce.com" -F "user[password]=password" -F "authenticity_token=ok2ttOdoVqDhoxKNHjhzFj6maV6ty25nnuOGj4+o7SpayOpWgyZ3FMZmcNEMPpOzWekXtznGWTuPLa5ydLEpHQ==" http://localhost:3000/users/sign_in
<html><body>You are being <a href="http://localhost:3000/instances/11/browse">redirected</a>.</body></html>vagrant@helix 
$ cat dookie
# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# http://curl.haxx.se/docs/http-cookies.html
# This file was generated by libcurl! Edit at your own risk.

localhost   FALSE   /   FALSE   0   XSRF-TOKEN  XJRVOCrEHq4p46jBtqsaXT%2BLav%2BgbwiIc8Btt5VAALkf1vyzDPLvTz%2BuWVg5mwrA4Mk%2FpTT5rCNBToRRAOR1TQ%3D%3D
#HttpOnly_localhost FALSE   /   FALSE   0   _raymond_session    VGYxNmdSemJtZDNrZDR3ZU...PT0%3D--2b9dc41d2cef63563f421336deeafaa38ad925ba
localhost   FALSE   /   FALSE   0   __profilin  p%3Dt
localhost   FALSE   /   FALSE   1469650312  visited true

$ curl -X POST -b dookie -c eookie -F "name=world" -F "owners[]=ali" -F "members[]=ali" -F "instance_id=pp3.ali" -F "authenticity_token=XJRVOCrEHq4p46jBtqsaXT+Lav+gbwiIc8Btt5VAALkf1vyzDPLvTz+uWVg5mwrA4Mk/pTT5rCNBToRRAOR1TQ==" http://localhost:3000/api/v1/projects/create

$ cat dookie

# http://curl.haxx.se/docs/http-cookies.html
# This file was generated by libcurl! Edit at your own risk.

#HttpOnly_localhost	FALSE	/	FALSE	0	_raymond_session	VGYxNmdSemJtZDNrZDR3ZU...PT0%3D--2b9dc41d2cef63563f421336deeafaa38ad925ba

$ cat eookie
# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# http://curl.haxx.se/docs/http-cookies.html
# This file was generated by libcurl! Edit at your own risk.

localhost	FALSE	/	FALSE	0	XSRF-TOKEN	XJRVOCrEHq4p46jBtqsaXT%2BLav%2BgbwiIc8Btt5VAALkf1vyzDPLvTz%2BuWVg5mwrA4Mk%2FpTT5rCNBToRRAOR1TQ%3D%3D
#HttpOnly_localhost	FALSE	/	FALSE	0	_raymond_session	eTNmckhBMUNHY1hxOVpLYlZk...PT0%3D--491cdd912d993d87b2ba214d687518a5859f4ea1

```

We can see that the XSRF-TOKEN changed for each redirect, and _raymond_session changed for each request, to prevent someone from reuse the _raymond_session
